I.name: Lightslinger
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an [[champion ability|ability]], '''Lucian's''' next [[basic attack]] {{tip|on-attack}} within {{fd|3.5}} seconds fires an additional shot after {{fd|0.25}} seconds, which deals {{as|{{pp|key=%|50 to 60|1;7;13}} AD {{as|physical damage}}}}, increased to {{as|100% AD}} against {{tip|minion|minions}}.
The second shot applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
If '''Lucian's''' primary target is killed before the second shot can go off, he automatically shoots another enemy in range.

{{sbc|Innate - Vigilance:}} Whenever '''Lucian''' is {{tip|heal|healed}}, {{tip|shield|shielded}} or granted a [[buff]] by an ally, his next two shots within 6 seconds are empowered to deal {{as|14|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}. The empowered shots can stack up to 4 times and applies against structures.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: After casting an champion ability, Lucian's next basic attack on-attack within 3.5 seconds fires an additional shot after 0.25 seconds, which deals 1;7;13 â€’ undefined AD physical damage, increased to 100% AD against minions.
The second shot applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by critical strike modifiers.
If Lucian's primary target is killed before the second shot can go off, he automatically shoots another enemy in range.
Innate - Vigilance: Whenever Lucian is healed, shielded or granted a buff by an ally, his next two shots within 6 seconds are empowered to deal 14 (+ 20% AD) bonus magic damage on-hit. The empowered shots can stack up to 4 times and applies against structures.
I.notes:
* ''Lightslinger'' is triggered and consumed by the first attack.
* The second attack, if the initial target was killed, will prioritize enemy champions regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not and enemy {{tip|minion|minions}} with {{sti|health|{{as|low health}}}}.
** ''Lightslinger'' will still be consumed if no second target is found when '''Lucian''' fires.
* '''Lucian''' can perform actions freely while firing ''Lightslinger'' since the second attack is integrated into the first one.
** The second attack has special movement animations depending on the direction '''Lucian''' is moving while firing.
* The additional shot counts as a separate hit for effects such as {{ri|Electrocute}}, {{iis|Muramana}} {{nie|Shock}}, and {{iis|Eclipse}} {{nie|Ever Rising Moon}}.

Q.name: Piercing Light
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lucian''' fires a laser in a line in the direction of the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit.
Q.descriptionHtml: Active: Lucian fires a laser in a line in the direction of the target enemy, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
Q.notes: * ''Piercing Light'' will attempt to lead the target if it is moving but does not adjust further during cast time (enemies can dodge the laser if they change their position by a sufficient amount during the cast time).

W1.name: Ardent Blaze
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lucian''' fires a missile in the target direction that explodes in a cross pattern upon hitting an enemy or maximum range, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for 1 second.
Enemies hit are marked for 6 seconds.

'''Lucian''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 1 second when he or allied champions damage a marked target. Allied champions triggering this effect grant '''Lucian''' ''{{ai|Lightslinger|Lucian|Vigilance}}''.
W1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lucian fires a missile in the target direction that explodes in a cross pattern upon hitting an enemy or maximum range, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and granting sight of the area for 1 second.
Enemies hit are marked for 6 seconds.
Lucian gains bonus movement speed for 1 second when he or allied champions damage a marked target. Allied champions triggering this effect grant Lucian Lucian's Vigilance.
W1.notes:
{{Effect at cast time end}}
** Like most [[projectile|missiles]], it will not collide with enemies whose center is beyond the maximum range (not behind '''Lucian'''), but this determines only the center and timing of the explosion.
* ''Ardent Blaze'' will cast from wherever '''Lucian''' is at the end of the cast time.
* '''Lucian''' will not gain ''Ardent Blaze's'' bonus movement speed if attacks on {{as|marked|buzzword}} targets are {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, {{tip|block|blocked}}, or if missed while the attacker is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* {{tip|persistent damage|DoTs}} will proc ''Ardent Blaze'' only once.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the mark.

E.name: Relentless Pursuit
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} ''Relentless Pursuit's'' cooldown is {{sti|cdr|reduced}} by 1 second for each ''{{ai|Lightslinger|Lucian}}'' shot hit, doubled to 2 seconds against enemy {{tip|champions}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Lucian''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the target direction.

''Relentless Pursuit'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Lucian's''' basic attack timer.
'''''Lucian''' can cast any of his [[champion ability|abilities]] during the dash. Relentless Pursuit will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by 1 second for each Lucian's Lightslinger shot hit, doubled to 2 seconds against enemy champions.
Active: Lucian dashes in the target direction.

Relentless Pursuit resets Lucian's basic attack timer.
Lucian can cast any of his champion ability during the dash. Relentless Pursuit will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
E.notes:
* Additional on-hits during ''Lightslinger'' are not considered for the cooldown reduction (i.e {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}, {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}).
* Unlike some dashes, '''Lucian's''' dash speed does ''not'' scale with his {{as|movement speed}}.
* ''Relentless Pursuit's'' dash can go through terrain, but will not be extended further if the target location is within terrain, unlike other dashes, like {{ci|Ekko}}'s {{ai|Phase Dive|Ekko}}.

R.name: The Culling
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lucian''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to 3 seconds, rapidly firing up to 22 {{as|(+ 1 per 4% critical strike chance)}} shots in the target direction. Each shot deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit, doubled against {{tip|minion|minions}}. ''The Culling'' can be recast after {{fd|0.75}} seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.
While channeling, '''Lucian''' is {{tip|ghosted}} and may still move and cast ''{{ai|Relentless Pursuit|Lucian}}''.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lucian channels for up to 3 seconds, rapidly firing up to 22 (+ 1 per 4% critical strike chance) shots in the target direction. Each shot deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against minions. The Culling can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.
While channeling, Lucian is ghosted and may still move and cast Lucian's Relentless Pursuit.
Recast: Lucian ends The Culling.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage Per Shot|{{ap|15 to 45}} {{as|(+ 25% AD)}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}}}
{{st|Minion Damage Per Shot|{{ap|15*2 to 45*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25*2}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|15*2}}% AP)}}}}
R.notes:
* At {{as|0% critical strike chance}}, ''The Culling'' can fire up to 22 shots.
** The '''total''' damage at the base number of shots is {{as|{{ap|15*22 to 45*22}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25*22}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|15*22}}% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}}.
** Against minions, this is increased to {{as|{{ap|15*22*2 to 45*22*2}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25*22*2}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|15*22*2}}% AP)}}.
* At {{as|100% critical strike chance}}, ''The Culling'' fires up to 25 additional shots, for a total of 47 shots.
** The '''total''' damage at the maximum number of shots (at {{as|100% critical strike chance}}) is {{as|{{ap|15*47 to 45*47}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25*47}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|15*47}}% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}}.
** Against minions, this is increased to {{as|{{ap|15*47*2 to 45*47*2}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25*47*2}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|15*47*2}}% AP)}}.
* The fire rate increases with the number of shots.
* During ''The Culling'', '''Lucian's''' facing direction is in the direction that he is firing.
* '''Lucian''' can interact with {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}} or {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} without {{tip|interrupt|interrupting}} ''The Culling''.
* ''The Culling'' creates the shots at an offset of 35 units to the front plus 35 units towards each side of '''Lucian''' (sides alternating, first shot fired from '''Lucian's''' right gun), unlike the missiles of most abilities.
* The damage dealt by each bullet of ''The Culling'' is calculated when the bullet reaches a target, just like single missile abilities.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} only blocks one instance of damage.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Lucian''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
